attributes.action: M5, A358, A303 Killing People, Crippling the Economy
attributes.additional_details:
With sympathy to all those who have suffered in yesterday's tragedy, can we ask the Gorvernment fo finally go ahead with the long planned, but frozen improvements to the A303, A358 and M5.

Daily there are accidents and delays on these roads which are dangerous and cost the economy billions in delays, and impacts on peoples lives.
